about.title: My Three.js Projects
about.more02: This is the Starter Development Template on Vue.js + Three.js with internationalization, routers and store.
about.more03: Prepared for connection to Google Analytics and Google Search Console. The template is customized and optimized for PWA (Progressive Web App) technology.
about.more04: There are a LOT of interesting things here! 😉🤓
